detectors.description:
Reentrancy in RewardPool.exit() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardPool.sol#400-404):
	External calls:
	- withdraw(balanceOf[msg.sender]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardPool.sol#402)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardPool.sol#274)
		- stakeToken.safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardPool.sol#394)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardPool.sol#403)
		- rewardToken.mint(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardPool.sol#413)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardPool.sol#403)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardPool.sol#316)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardPool.sol#403)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardPool.sol#315)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardPool.sol#403)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardPool.sol#318)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardPool.sol#411)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardPool.sol#403)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RewardPool.sol#319)
